name: Empires & Puzzles: RPG Quest
summary: "Empires & Puzzles is an all-new, social Role Playing Game that delivers on all fronts. The game is designed from the ground up to offer the most rewarding puzzle Role Playing Game experience yet seen on mobile devices. Players new to the genre can start by battling their way through an epic story, one puzzle at a time. More experienced players can engage in fast-paced online battles and co-operative Titan battles. All battles and quests provide the player with resources used to build and upgrade a mighty mountaintop fortress. The rich experience is made even more rewarding with gorgeous art and hundreds of heroes to collect and upgrade."
